body_html:
@on-the-run, It is strange I don't see any log about "RDMA_MESSAGE_ACK sent" and "RDMA_MESSAGE_TENSOR_REQUEST received".
Did you log anything inside RdmaAckBuffer::SendNextItem()?

Also, I see many occurrences of recv RDMA message: RDMA_MESSAGE_ACK, imm_data recevied = 986591585. I assume 986591585 is NameHash('rx_ack_buffer'), can you confirm?
